title: cafter
author: cafter
content: If you are single, trying to find a best partner you dreamed off , like he/she would be handsome/beautiful, good behavior, caring, not very arrogant and lot of qualities you would like to be in your partner,then here are some places where you can find your life partner1. coffee shop: if you are a girl/boy then you need to go to coffee shop regularly, there you can get your respective partner sitting single,you can observe their character like he/she is caring(watching his/her behavior with other people like shop keeper, waiter etc, he/she is arrogant or not , all you can observe going regularly at coffee shop,2. airport: if you regularly travel in plane and want a really beautiful girl then you can get him/her at airport, the cabin crew or host are really handsome/beautiful respectively, but here it is hard to determine he/she is single or not you can find this technics on web if you are interested in looks,3. neighbour: you can observe you neigbour or their children are single or not

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: I would like to add number 4: Onlyfans, if you are looking for your dream girl, visit onlyfans, that's the only place you will find your dream girl. Lol.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I do not like number 3 observing your neighbors. Your neighbor might call the local authorities if they see you spying on them or their children.  I will also add to go on blind dates. There are so many different online websites for this. Or try a dating app you can easily download it to your mobile and most of them do not even cost money.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: mich on February 25, 2023, 06:02:35 AMI do not like number 3 observing your neighbors. Your neighbor might call the local authorities if they see you spying on them or their children.  I will also add to go on blind dates. There are so many different online websites for this. Or try a dating app you can easily download it to your mobile and most of them do not even cost money. this is for, like good relationship, on dating apps we cannot see the total personality , they may faking their character or other things like very bad history,etcand observing neighbor means, if you don't leave in a flat, like have a home at street or like that then you may regularly say good morning or talk something to your neighbor this can be a good relationship of both are agree.it's just off topic don't mind

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: I would recommend you to visit Pakistan for dream girl to visit Pakistan..

comments.author: OGsmall
comments.body: Car22 you did posted well but some are left out like the Instagram, Facebook, Twitter The local/small concert Parties Wedding event Yoga class This is one of the best for me (The Bar)

comments.author: Nosan
comments.body: I think to bother with the search girl does not need it she will find you herself when it is necessary!

comments.author: Bernadine Frazier
comments.body: if you're looking for a partner with specific qualities that you've always dreamed of, then you need to be strategic about where you're looking. I mean, going to coffee shops regularly is a great idea because you can observe people's behavior and see if they have the qualities you're looking for. You can see if they're caring, respectful to others, and not too arrogant. Airport could also be a good option, especially if you're someone who travels a lot. You might run into some really beautiful people, like cabin crew or hosts. But it might be a little harder to determine if they're single or not. It's always best to do a little research beforehand if you're interested in someone's looks.Lastly, I suggest paying attention to your neighbors. You never know, someone in your neighborhood might be single and have the qualities you're looking for. You can observe their behavior and see if they're someone you'd be interested in getting to know better. All in all, finding the perfect partner takes time and effort, but it's worth it in the end.
